result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel Lester Berg was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Repeater, Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to the Clerk of Courts Office- $25.00/month payment plan to begin on 9/1/15 and the 1st of each month thereafter. Failure to pay will be warrant.
Not to have abusive contact with: Diane Montpetit.

timeConds.notes: banked to be used by agent if necessary.

CASES: 15CM23, 15CM33 Defendant Daniel L Berg in court with attorney Chelsea Anne Whitley.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 8:55AM 15CM23 Ct 1: Def plea of G. CT accepts plea, finds G, enters JOC. DRI 15CM33. 

SENTENCING: w/h sent, prob 2 yrs- appear today, no abusive contact w/ diane montpetit, 60 days banked jail to be used by agent if necessary, $265.60 fine/cost- $25/mo PP beg 9/1/15 and 1st of e/m thereafter, 22 days sent credit. 9:06am adj.

CASES: 15CM33, 15CM23 Defendant Daniel L Berg in court with attorney Daniel E. Firkus.  Defendant Daniel L Berg in custody.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 1:50pm Def does qualify. Def- pleas of NG in both cases. bond has been set in 15CM23. CT- Reinstating bond in 15CM23, CT quashes warrant in 15CM23 and 15CM336. DST. 1:59pm adj.  Jury trial scheduled for May 7, 2015 at 08:30 am.

CASES: 15CM33, 15CM23 Attorney Shelly Tomtschik in court.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   KJB- Clerk. 12:03PM Def has not submitted ct appted paperwork, has not contacted PDs office. 15CM33 tracked.  State req warrants. CT issues warrants in both files. 12:04pm adj.
Report in support of probable cause for arrest. Request for criminal complaint
Adjourned initial appearance on February 27, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Not to have contact with:  Diane Montpetit.  May go one time to the property with Law Enforcement to gather belongings.   Not to commit any new crimes.  Must appear at all future court appearances.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 48 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.
